description:
Disable thread under DRT content_shell unless explicitly enabled

We happen to not enable threaded compositing when running
layout tests by virtue of the fact that it is enabled by a Finch
experiment which is only initialized in chrome.

When getting rid of this Finch experiment, a bunch of layout
tests blew up because that had the effect of enabling threaded
compositing on the tests. This makes it so that won't happen.

BUG=302738, 233830, 306557

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=231802

messages.text:
The aforementioned "blowing up lyaout tests" is at
https://codereview.chromium.org/26389003/
LGTM to unblock, but can we file a bug to re-enable the thread on layout tests? The thread is the path that we ship virtually everywhere now...

On 2013/10/29 21:56:56, piman wrote:
> LGTM to unblock, but can we file a bug to re-enable the thread on layout tests?
> The thread is the path that we ship virtually everywhere now...

Think this is https://code.google.com/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=229774

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/ccameron@chromium.org/51333003/50001

subject: Disable thread under DRT content_shell unless explicitly enabled
